caption.title: Effect of mitigation on the global emergence in drivers of ecosystem stress.
caption.p: The proportion of the ocean in each year 1900–2100 affected by multiple stress (>1 driver) and quadruple stress (all 4 drivers) in the ‘business-as-usual' scenario (RCP8.5) and a mitigation scenario (RCP4.5). Shaded areas represent ±1 inter-model s.d.
